Nerangs.ab: daitikanąmcā aidiiūnąm hiiat̰ urunō yazamaidē aṣ̌āunąm āat̰ urunō yazamaidē rāspīg ō ī dast ī hōy ī zōt šawišn hāwan abar gīrišn pad kudō.zātanąmcīt̰ zōt zōhr andak-ē andar hāwan rēzišn narąmcā hāwan abar dastag pahikāfišn nāirinąmcā dastag abar hāwan pahikāfišn yaēšąm vahehīš daēnā̊ abar zamīg pahikāfišn vanaiṇtī vā rāspīg hāwan abar urwēs nihišn abar sar ī ādušt pahikāfišn və̄ṇghən vā abar hōm pālā ud warsdān ud urwēs pahikāfišn vaōnarə̄ vā abāz ō ī zōhr rēzišn

"At daitikanąmcā aidiiūnąm hiiat̰ urunō yazamaidē aṣ̌āunąm āat̰ urunō yazamaidē, the rāspīg has to go to the left hand of the zōt and to take the hāwan. At kudō.zātanąmcīt̰, the zōt has to pour a drop of zōhr into the hāwan. At narąmcā, he has to hit the dastag with the hāwan. At nāirinąmcā, he has to hit the hāwan with the dastag. At yaēšąm vahehīš daēnā̊, he has to hit the earth. At vanaiṇtī vā, the rāspīg has to put the hāwan on the urwēs and hit the top of the ādušt. At və̄ṇghən vā, he has to hit the hōm-pālā, the warsdān and the urwēs. At vaōnarə̄ vā, he has to pour (the zōhr's driblet) back to the zōhr."

Quotations.ab: kudō.zātanąmcit̰ kār-ē nē dānēm narąmca abar hāwan nairīnąmca ay abar abarhāwan ẏaēšąm vahehiš andar rāh daēnā̊ abar zamīg vanaiṇti vā abar *θraxti abar ātaxš vaŋhən abar tašt ī waras vaōnarə andar dast ī zōt u-š pas ō war ī zōhrag barišn

"For the recitation of kudō.zātanąmcit̰ I do not know of any ritual act. At narąmca, (he should bring the zōhr) to the hāwan. At nairīnąmca, to the hāwan. (He should recite) ẏaēšąm vahehiš on the way. At daēnā̊, to the earth. At vanaiṇti vā, to a corner of the fire(-stand). At vaŋhәn vā, to saucer for the waras. At vaōnarә vā, he should bring it to the hand of the zōt and then one should carry it to the side of the zōhr cup, and keep it next to the zōhrag."
Cf. N52.9a (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003: p. 238-9; Cantera, 2014: p. 228 f.)

kudō.zātanąmcit̰ kār-ē nē dānēm narąmca abar hāwan nairīnąmca ay abar-hāwan ẏaēšąm vahehiš andar rāh daēnā̊ abar zamīg vanaiṇti vā abar *θraxti abar ātaxš vaŋhən abar tašt ī waras vaōnarə [abar] dast ī zōt u-š pas [ō] *war ī zōhrag barišn

"I do not know ritual action for kudō.zātanąmcit̰. At narąmca (he should hold the zōhr) over the mortar. At nairīnąmca , over the pestle. At ẏaēšąm vahehiš , on the way. At daēnā̊, over the earth. At vanaiṇti vā over one corner of the fire. At vaŋhən, over the saucer for the waras. At vaōnarə, over the hand of the zōt. Then, he has to carry it to the side of the zōhrag."
